summary: A medium sized house located South East of Markarth. Includes a Smithy, Alchemy Table, pet Dog, horse and more + Lots more to come!!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=15]RiverStead[/size][/center]

[size=5]This house contains everything you need to survive in the land of Skyrim. This mod shall have regular updates and I am open to user suggestions and constructive criticism.[/size] 

[size=5](Easiest way to get to the house is to type into the console: \"coc riverhouse\" or you can just discover it by yourself)[/size]

[size=5][color=red]If you like this mod then please feel free to endorse it![/size][/color]

[size=5]Features:[/size]
[size=4]Forge, workbench, grindstone, tanning rack and smelter.[/size]
[size=4]Alchemy table with replenishing alchemy ingredients chest.[/size]
[size=4]Weaponracks[/size]
[size=4]Displaycase[/size]
[size=4]Two Mannequins[/size]
[size=4]Bed and storage[/size]
[size=4]Your own dog called Winston and a horse!(I need name suggestions for the horse)[/size]

[size=5]To come....[/size]
[size=4]Enchanting table[/size]
[size=4]Bookshelves[/size]
[size=4]Shrines[/size]
[size=5]Post comments of what you would like to see!![/size]

[size=5]Please check out my youtube channel: www.youtube.com/user/xiTzPhiLGx Thank you[/size]
author: xiTzPhiLGx
